abstract: Industrial stocks lost more than most after uneven reports from 3M and U.S. Steel.
snippet: Industrial stocks lost more than most after uneven reports from 3M and U.S. Steel.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell for a second consecutive day amid wrangling by lawmakers over plans to raise the federal debt limit and earnings forecasts from several companies that disappointed investors.

headline.main: Shares Decline as Wall Street Waits for Washington
headline.print_headline: Profit Outlook and Debt Weigh on Shares Again
